name: test_opencti_client
description:
arrange: deploy the OpenCTI charm.
    act: use the OpenCTI client to create some users.
    assert: users are created normally.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: deploy the OpenCTI charm.
act: use the OpenCTI client to create some users.
assert: users are created normally.
